title: Cross of the Dutchman 1.0 – Action adventure game based on the true story of the folk legend
content: Cross of the Dutchman is an action adventure game based on the true story of the folk legend ‘Pier Gerlofs Donia’.   The story takes place in medieval Western Europe, in the province of Frisia, near the turn of the 16th century.
